EmailTemplate.name: 9b.2 Feedback to summer staff: invite to apply for higher role
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback from your role this summer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Many thanks for your contribution to NCS with The Challenge. Following the feedback received on your performance, we would like to invite you to apply for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Recommendation_for_next_year__c} for 2014.
Please follow the link and complete an application form. An assessment date will be sent to you in due course.
N.B. if you would prefer to work in the same role as last year, we would welcome you back without an assessment.
All returning staff must complete the new style application form for data purposes and to open a new profile for the year. Please take this opportunity to add any new experience to your application.
Please follow the link below to complete the application form, if you are applying for a different role an invitation for assessment will be sent to you in due course.*
http://thechallenge.force.com/TCN/New_Job_Application
Thank you for your ongoing interest in NCS with The Challenge and we look forward to working with you again.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} CR 9.2
*Please note the Community Mentor role is now called Community Facilitator.
